title: Disney Plus, Hulu, and HBO Max are all over 60 percent off for Black Friday
summary: You can stream the Seth Rogen comedy The Studio on Apple TV. | Image: Apple TV Plus The holidays are a great time to see family, exchange gifts, and enjoy a good meal.
